sourcesContent:
<script>
import { mapActions } from 'vuex';
import LoginForm from '../components/LoginForm.vue';

export default {
  data() {
    return {
      errorMsg: '',
      username: '', // Assuming you have these data properties
      password: '', // in your component's data
    };
  },
  methods: {
    ...mapActions(['login']),
    handleLogin() {
      const credentials = {
        username: this.username,
        password: this.password,
      };
      
      console.log('handle login credentials =', credentials);
      
      const success = this.login(credentials);

      if (success) {
        // Redirect to dashboard if login is successful
        this.$router.push('/dashboard');
      } else {
        // Set error message to be displayed to the user
        this.errorMsg = 'Invalid username or password';
      }
    },
  },
  components: {
    LoginForm,
  },
};
</script>
